S.FORM: lokah cimu qabax. tgaring ta lay.
tuliq tmatuk tunux mamu.
sesiy lokah.
tama.
lokah cimu qabax. kisa ga, sbaqun cimu kmayan ke na nniqun na Tayal qani.
S.TRANSL: 大家好。今天老師要教大家食物的泰雅語怎麼說。
Hello everyone. Today I am going to teach you how to say food in Thai.

S.FORM: baqun mamu mung ke na sesiy ga.
S.TRANSL: Do you understand what the teacher says?

S.FORM: sesiy, ini mu kbaqi mung. ana su kmayan min qutux loyi.
S.TRANSL: 老師，我不懂。可以再說一次嗎?
I don’t understand. Can you repeat it again?

S.FORM: ini mu pungi ke su, tyaba hayi kmayan ke su ga?
S.TRANSL: 我聽不到，可以大聲一點嗎?
I can’t hear you, can you speak louder?

S.FORM: ktayux cqani! glux kingan kmayan min qutux.
S.TRANSL: 請看這裡! 跟著我唸一遍。
Look here, please! Repeat after me.

S.FORM: blaq calay qa lpxan mamu.
lpux min qutux loyi. tyaba hayi ke mamu.
S.TRANSL: Read it again. Please speak louder.

S.FORM: ta kcyang. laxi kayan.
agan qa biru pqwasan mamu.
uya, sesiy.
agan enpit mamu.
sesiy, wal mu kngyan maray enpit mu la.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring my pen.

S.FORM: agan ccom mamu.
sesiy, wal mu kngyan maray ccom mu la.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring my eraser.

S.FORM: ksiyux cikay ccom qa seto su.
S.TRANSL: 請跟旁邊同學借橡皮擦。
Please borrow erasers from your classmates.

S.FORM: ksyugay ta cikay ccom su ga?
hngaw ta mqwas biru la.
tqbaq ta ski cqai ha, tqbaqay ta babaw nya la.
S.TRANSL: 我們就上到這邊，下次再見。
Class dismissed, see you next week.

S.FORM: ima isu?
kingan ga Kacu.
ima isu?
kinngan ga laqi ni Maray, Kacu lalu mu.
S.TRANSL: I am the son of Maray, and my name is Kacu.

S.FORM: ima isu?
kinngan ga seto ni Maray, Kacu lalu mu.
S.TRANSL: I am a student in Maray, my name is Kacu.

S.FORM: ima lalu su?
Kacu lalu mu.
ima lalu yaba su?
Masing lalu yaba mu.
ima qa hiya?
hiya ga Kuras.
hiya ga, qbsuyal mu mlikuy, Kuras lalu nya.
S.TRANSL: He is my brother, his name is Kuras.

S.FORM: ima lalu nya hiya?
lalu nya ga Kuras.
Maray lalu nya ku?
uya, Maray lalu nya.
Masing lalu nya ku?
iyat, Kuras lalu nya.
ima cquliq qaca hiya?
hiya ga Pisuy. Yata mu hiya.
ima cquliq qaca hiya?
hiya ga rangi mu, Lomuy lalu nya.
S.TRANSL: 她是我的朋友，她的名字是Lomuy。
She is my friend and her name is Lomuy.

S.FORM: pisa kawas su la?
mpux kawas mu la.
pisa kawas nya la?
mpux saying kawas nya la.
pisa kawas yaba su la?
miman kawas yaba mu la.
pisa qabax rawil su?
S.TRANSL: How many brothers and sisters do you have?

S.FORM: maki saying qbsuyal mu mlikuy ru kneril, qutux swahi mu mlikuy ki kneril.
S.TRANSL: 我有兩個兄姐，一個弟妹。
I have two brothers and sisters and one younger brother and sister.

S.FORM: maki qbsuyal su mlikuy ku?
uka qbsuyal mu mlikuy.
pisa qabax he muyax mamu?
S.TRANSL: How many people are in your family?

S.FORM: payat qabax he muyax myan.
S.TRANSL: There are four of us in our family.

S.FORM: cyan maki inu pqwasan su biru?
nya cu mqwas biru cqa Giran.
ima qa hiya?
hiya ga mama mu.
cyan mtiyaw nanu mama su hiya?
S.TRANSL: 你的舅舅從事什麼工作?
What does your uncle do for a living?

S.FORM: cyan alan Knsat hiya.
ima cquliq qaca hiya?
hiya ga qbsuyal mu kneril.
cyan mtiyaw qbsuyal su kneril ku?
S.TRANSL: Does your sister have a job?

S.FORM: cyan mtiyaw cqa byoying hiya.
trawil saying naha ku?
S.TRANSL: 他們兩個人是兄弟姐妹嗎?

S.FORM: iyat, naha ga trangi.
isu ga Tayal ga?
uya, kingan ga Tayal.
S.TRANSL: Yes, I’m from the [Atayal] tribe. *[Amis] Please change to the respective ethnic group.

S.FORM: Tayal qa bes su ga?
uya, Tayal qa bes mu.
S.TRANSL: Yes, but she is of the Atayal tribe.

S.FORM: hlawax yaba su ku?
uya, hlawax calay qabax muyax myan.
S.TRANSL: Yes, we are all very tall.

S.FORM: cyan mqwas biru swahi su kneril la?
S.TRANSL: Does your sister go to school?

S.FORM: uya, cyan mqwas biru hiya la.
baq kmayal ke Tayal swahi su?
S.TRANSL: Do your siblings speak the language?

S.FORM: uya, baq kmayal ke Tayal naha.
S.TRANSL: Yes, they speak the ethnic language.

S.FORM: pisa qabax trawil su?
S.TRANSL: How many brothers and sisters do you have?

S.FORM: maki tyugan rawil mu.
S.TRANSL: I have three brothers and sisters.

S.FORM: msqun cimu maki muyax ki yaba ru yaya su?
S.TRANSL: 你和爸爸媽媽一起住嗎?
Do you live with your parents?

S.FORM: uya, msqun cami maki muyax ki yaba ru yaya mu.
S.TRANSL: 是，我和爸爸媽媽一起住。
Yes, I live with my mom and dad.

S.FORM: msqun cimu maki muyax ki yutas ru yaki su?
S.TRANSL: 你和爺爺奶奶一起住嗎?
Do you live with your grandparents?

S.FORM: ini, ini cami msqun maki muyax ki yutas ru yaki mu.
S.TRANSL: 不，我沒和跟他們一起住。
No, I didn’t live with them.

S.FORM: msqun su maki muyax ki ima?
msqun cu yaba yaya ru qbsuyal mlikuy maki muyax.
S.TRANSL: 我跟爸爸、媽媽、哥哥住在一起。
I live with my father, mother and brother.

S.FORM: knahol su inu?
knahol cu Skikun mwah.
S.TRANSL: I’m from the Four Seasons Tribe.

S.FORM: cyan maki inu muyax su?
cyan maki Skikun muyax mu.
S.TRANSL: Our home is in the Four Seasons Tribe.

S.FORM: cyan inu kinholan su?
kinholan mu ga qalang Skikun.
S.TRANSL: My hometown is in the Four Seasons Tribe.

S.FORM: cyan maki inu qalang mamu?
qalang myan ga cyan maki Skikun
S.TRANSL: Our tribe is in Four Seasons Tribe.

S.FORM: knwan baq su musa qalang mamu?
S.TRANSL: 你什麼時候會回去部落?
When are you going back to the tribe?

S.FORM: hngawan ryax bagan lga, musa cu muyax la.
S.TRANSL: I will go back in the summer.

S.FORM: kingan ga laqi Tayal
blaq kayal nya coni?
nyan mhtux wagi nya la, kilux calay kayal nya.
S.TRANSL: The sun is coming out, it's very hot.

S.FORM: baq qhiyaq tanux ku?
S.TRANSL: Is it going to be cold outside?

S.FORM: ltu calay tanux, piyux hayi mlukus.
S.TRANSL: It's cold, so wear more clothes.

S.FORM: baq kilux tanux ku?
ini, nyan sbehuy la, sbehuy calay tanux.
maha nanu kayal nya coni?
ini kilus ru ini kltu, coni, blaq calay kayal nya.
S.TRANSL: 今天不冷也不熱，很舒服。
It's neither cold nor hot today, very comfortable.

S.FORM: maha nanu kayal gbyan coni?
uka yulung nya, cyan mhtux qa knituh la.
S.TRANSL: 天空沒有雲，星星出來了。
There were no clouds in the sky; the stars came out.

S.FORM: maha nanu kayal nya tanux?
mica na mhngaw qwalax nya, mhtux wagi ru hongu utux la.
S.TRANSL: 雨剛剛停，出了太陽，彩虹出來了。
The rain has just stopped, the sun has come out, the rainbow is coming out.

S.FORM: maha nanu kayal mamu kya hiya?
nyan mbehuy cami cqani hiya.
S.TRANSL: We're going to have a big storm here.

S.FORM: blaq kayal mamu kya hiya?
blaq kayal nya, tyaba wagi nya cqani.
S.TRANSL: Very well, out of the big sun.

S.FORM: musa cu pqwasan biru la.
S.TRANSL: I have to go to school.

S.FORM: ltu kayal nya, piyux hayi mlukus.
S.TRANSL: The weather is very cold, so wear more clothes.

S.FORM: musa cu tanux kisa la.
baq tyaba qwalax nya kisa, kngyay su maray bruku.
S.TRANSL: 等一下會下大雨，你要記得帶傘。
It's going to rain heavily, you have to remember to bring an umbrella.

S.FORM: baq mqwalax ku?
wal mutung mebung coni, pqwalax hayi kisa la.
S.TRANSL: 剛剛打雷了，等一下應該就會下雨。
There was thunder just now, and it's supposed to rain later.

S.FORM: qnwalax la ku?
qnwalax coni ha, nyan mhngaw qwalax nya la.
S.TRANSL: 剛剛有下雨，現在雨停了。
It just rained, and now it's stopped.

S.FORM: qnwalax la ku?
pisan hayi qnwalax la, nya mhoyiq qa ryaniq qani.
S.TRANSL: 好像下過雨了，馬路是濕的。
It seems to have rained and the road is wet.

S.FORM: minqwalax ku? cwa su nya si qarus?
S.TRANSL: 有下雨嗎?你怎麼全身都濕了?
Is it raining? Why are you all wet?

S.FORM: cyan mqwalax tanux, ini cu aray bruku.
S.TRANSL: 外面在下雨，我沒有帶雨傘。
It's raining outside, so I didn't bring an umbrella.

S.FORM: cyan su blaq ga?
tyaba calay behuy nya, mxan calay tunux mu, sbyuhan na behuy qani.
S.TRANSL: The wind is blowing so hard that my head hurts.

S.FORM: cyan su blaq ga?
tyaba calay wagi nya, txing calay tunux mu sbu’ wagi qani.
S.TRANSL: 太陽好大，曬得我頭好暈。
The sun is so big, it makes me dizzy.

S.FORM: kngyan mu maray enpit la.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring my pen.

S.FORM: ksyuxay misu.
kngyan mu maray qepit la.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring my chopsticks.

S.FORM: ini cu aray uyi, hata mes ha.
S.TRANSL: I don’t have one either, let’s go buy one.

S.FORM: hata mes enpit ga?
S.TRANSL: Let’s go buy a pen, shall we?

S.FORM: uya ga, pbes cu ccom loyi.
S.TRANSL: Well, I still have to buy erasers.

S.FORM: hata mes knama ha ga?
S.TRANSL: Let’s go get breakfast, shall we?

S.FORM: iyat cu, mnaniq cu muyax la.
S.TRANSL: No, I’ve already eaten at home.

S.FORM: kngyan mu skilux sibing mu la.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to steam my lunchbox.

S.FORM: hali skilux sibing su ha.
kngyan mu maray sibing mu la.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring my lunchbox.

S.FORM: squn ta maniq sibing mu lga!
S.TRANSL: 那我們一起吃我的便當吧!
Then let’s eat my lunch box together!

S.FORM: nanu niqun su knryax qani?
S.TRANSL: What are you having for lunch?

S.FORM: pqaniq cu nhapuy ni pqwasan biru qani.
S.TRANSL: 我要吃學校的營養午餐。
I want a nutritious school lunch.

S.FORM: nanu niqun su knryax qani?
S.TRANSL: What are you having for lunch?

S.FORM: nyan cu maray sibing coni, squn ta maniq knryax ki!
S.TRANSL: 我今天有帶便當，我們中午一起吃吧!
I’ve brought a lunchbox today, let’s eat together at noon!

S.FORM: hata mcisan boru yawa ga?
S.TRANSL: Let’s go play basketball, shall we?

S.FORM: uya ga! hata ga.
hata mcisan boru yakyu ga?
iyat cu, pqwas cu biru.
biqi cu cikay capuh qaca.
S.TRANSL: Please help me with the broom.

S.FORM: uya, biqay misu capuh qani.
S.TRANSL: Okay, here’s a broomstick for you.

S.FORM: biqi cu cikay tapan qaca ha ga?
S.TRANSL: Can you help me with the cloth?

S.FORM: nyan cu cmapuh mwani, kayan cikay Kacu pragay su nya miq.
S.TRANSL: I’m sweeping the floor and you asked Kacu to carry it for you.

S.FORM: masoq su cmapuh lga?
masoq cu cmpuh la.
cwa su ini capuh la?
wayal mu suqun cmapuh la.
claq calay qa phlan ta roq qani, hali cmong cikay.
S.TRANSL: The floor is dirty, go clean it.

S.FORM: uya, haqa cu magan tapan ha.
S.TRANSL: Okay, I’ll go get the cloth.

S.FORM: claq calay qa tubun qaca, hali cmong cikay.
S.TRANSL: 那個窗戶很髒，去擦一下。
That window is very dirty, go clean it.

S.FORM: ini na cikay, ini mu suqi cmapuh cqani na.
S.TRANSL: 等一下，我還沒掃完這裡。
Wait a minute, I’m not done sweeping here yet.

S.FORM: nanu iyaw ptiyawun su kisa?
musa cu hkangi sesyi kisa.
S.TRANSL: I’m going to see my teacher.

S.FORM: masoq su mqwas biru lga, nanu iyaw ptiyawun su?
S.TRANSL: What do you do after school?

S.FORM: musa cu msqun mqwas qwas ki rangi mu.
S.TRANSL: I’m going to sing with my friends.

S.FORM: masoq mqwas biru hiya lga, nanu iyaw ptiyawun nya la?
musa lmngyaq hiya.
cyan maki muyax Lawa?
nyan maki muyax hiya, wah miyuk cka.
S.TRANSL: She’s at home, please come in.

S.FORM: cyan maki muyax Labi?
ini aki muyax hiya, maki nanu iyaw su?
S.TRANSL: 她不在，請問你有什麼事?
She’s not here, what can I do for you?

S.FORM: ima qaca?
yutas, kingan ga Pisuy, wahi cikay blihun su ha.
S.TRANSL: Grandpa, I’m Pisuy, please open the door.

S.FORM: ima isu?
Yabun, kingan ga Macyan, nyan cu mwah msqun mcisan isu la.
S.TRANSL: Yabun, I’m Macyan, I’ve come to play with you.

S.FORM: bsyaq misu ini ktali la.
uya wa! llungun misu calay. uwah mcisan ha!
S.TRANSL: 是啊!我很想念你。快來聊天吧!
Yeah! I miss you so much. Come on, let’s chat!

S.FORM: tama ha, nbux ocya ha.
S.TRANSL: Please sit down and have some tea.

S.FORM: mhway su.
nbux ocya ha.
talagay kinblaq buxun ocya mamu wa.
uwah ha, niqa ta qenan ha!
uya ga! talagay kinblaq ktalan qenan qani.
S.TRANSL: 好喔!這些桃子看起來很棒。

S.FORM: blaq niqun qenan qani ga?
uya, lbing ru blaq calay niqun.
masoq phapuy k’abi yaya mu la, wah maniq n’os ha!
S.TRANSL: 媽媽煮好晚餐了，快來吃吧!
Mom has cooked dinner, come and eat!

S.FORM: uya ga, haqa cu mema qba ha.
S.TRANSL: Okay, I’ll go wash my hands.

S.FORM: lokah maniq, wali su cquliq.
S.TRANSL: 盡量吃喝，你又不是外人。
Try to eat and drink as much as possible, you’re not an outsider.

S.FORM: piyux calay wal mu niqun la, ktngi cu calay la.
S.TRANSL: I ate a lot, I’m full.

S.FORM: lokah maniq ga, laxi kcayux.
wa, blaq calay niqun nhapuy mamu.
musa cu la, mwaha cu ktayux isu babaw nya loyi.
S.TRANSL: 我要離開了，下次再來看你。
I’m leaving, I’ll see you next time.

S.FORM: uya, sgagay ta la.
mnkun calay la, musa cu muyax la.
uwah mcisan babaw nya loyi ay!
thway musa su ay.
uya, uka iyaw su ga, uwah mcisan muyax mu.
S.TRANSL: Okay, come to my house sometime.

S.FORM: lokah cimu qabax, rayun cimu mkan bnheci qalang ta kisa.
S.TRANSL: 大家好，老師今天要帶大家去部落訪問耆老。
Hello everyone, today I’m taking you to the tribe to interview the elders.

S.FORM: uya ga! musa cami tqbaq kmayan ke Tayal ki bnheci ta.
S.TRANSL: 好喔!我們要跟耆老說泰雅語。

S.FORM: obih ta tehoq la?
iyat ta kinga tehoq la.
yutas Tasaw, nyan cami mwah mkan isu la.
S.TRANSL: Grandpa, we’ve come to see you.

S.FORM: wa! baq cimu kmayan ke Tayal ga! talagay kinblaq.
S.TRANSL: 你們會說泰雅語啊!真是太棒了!

S.FORM: lokah cimu qabax, rayun cimu mtiyaw cqa qmayax trakis kisa.
S.TRANSL: 大家好，老師今天要帶大家去小米田工作。
Hello everyone, today I will take you to work in the millet field.

S.FORM: sesiy, uya.
uwah mblaq cqrux cqani, aray qa qqaya qmahun mamu.
S.TRANSL: 大家過來排隊，記得帶好工具。
Come and line up, remember to bring your tools.

S.FORM: sesiy uya, nya cami ming qqaya qmahun myan la.
S.TRANSL: 是的，老師，我們都拿好工具了。
Yes, sir, we’ve got our tools.

S.FORM: tehoq ta la?
ini na, ato thyaq hayi na.
S.TRANSL: Not yet, it’s still far away.

S.FORM: usa miliq qsya isu.
uya, haqa cu miliq qsya kingan hiya.
usa magan qqaya ppgayas qbhniq isu hiya.
S.TRANSL: You go get the bird catcher.

S.FORM: uya, haqa cu ppgayas qbhniq kingan hiya.
S.TRANSL: Okay, I’ll go and catch the birds.

S.FORM: lokah cimu qabax, rayun cimu ktayux qnayat naha qbsinux kisa.
S.TRANSL: 大家好，我們今天要去動物園。
Hello everyone, we are going to the zoo today.

S.FORM: talagay kinblaq wa! pkusa ta maha nanu musa a?
S.TRANSL: 好棒喔!我們要怎麼去呢?
Awesome! How are we going to get there?

S.FORM: phlux ta basu musa.
blaq ta cqrux cqani, pbes ta kipu lay.
S.TRANSL: 大家排好隊，我們準備買票。
Everyone line up, we are ready to buy tickets.

S.FORM: uya
cyan maki lasu qa qbhniq hiya, mehong nya lga maqu, ktali kya nanak cimu la.
S.TRANSL: 前面是鳥類，後面是蛇類，大家自己參觀。
There are birds in the front and snakes in the back.

S.FORM: sesiy baq cu mngungu maqu kingan hiya.
ana moqo la, usa ktayux qbhniq isu hiya.
S.TRANSL: It doesn’t matter, then you go and watch the birds.

S.FORM: qutux tmucing kisa lga, mwah ta msqun msli cqani la.
S.TRANSL: 我們一個小時後回來集合。
We’ll be back in an hour.

S.FORM: uya, sesiy mhway su.
nanu qbsinux wayal su ktalun coni?
piyux calay maqu ru, piyux qbhniq wayal mu ktalan uyi.
S.TRANSL: 我看到了好多蛇，還有好多鳥。
I saw a lot of snakes and a lot of birds.

S.FORM: helax hayi, musa cami lay.
S.TRANSL: Hurry up, we have to go.

S.FORM: na’ cu cikay, moyay calay kakay mu la.
S.TRANSL: Wait for me, my feet are tired.

S.FORM: hata msqun lmngyaq llyung ga?
uya! hata lga!
piyux calay cquliq nyan lmngyaq cqani.
S.TRANSL: There are a lot of people swimming here.

S.FORM: cilung qsya nya cqani hiya, si ta lmngyaq cqani la.
S.TRANSL: 那裡水很深，我們在這裡游泳就好。
The water is deep there, so we just swim here.

S.FORM: maha su nanu mwah?
mhkangi cu mwah.
mglux su toruy nanu mwah?
S.TRANSL: What kind of car did you take?

S.FORM: glux cu basu mwah.
pkusa su nanu musa kyokay?
S.TRANSL: How do you go to church?

S.FORM: pnganun cu toruy ni yaba mu musa.
maha nanu musa pqwasan biru krryax hiya?
S.TRANSL: How does he usually go to school?

S.FORM: qmet zitensya musa pqwasan biru hiya.
S.TRANSL: He rode his bicycle to school.

S.FORM: maha nanu musa mes ramat qa yaki su?
S.TRANSL: How does your grandmother go to the grocery store?

S.FORM: qmet otobay musa mes ramat qa hiya.
S.TRANSL: She went to the grocery store on a motorcycle.

S.FORM: maha su nanu musa Giran?
S.TRANSL: How are you going to get to Yilan?

S.FORM: pglux cu basu musa Giran.
S.TRANSL: I want to take a bus to Yilan.

S.FORM: maha nanu musa Gipun hiya?
S.TRANSL: Why is he going to Japan?

S.FORM: pglux xikoki musa Gipun hiya.
S.TRANSL: He took a plane to Japan.

S.FORM: pglux toruy nanu musa Takaw hiya?
S.TRANSL: What bus did he take to Kaohsiung?

S.FORM: pglux kisya musa Takaw hiya.
S.TRANSL: He took a train to Kaohsiung.

S.FORM: pglux kisya musa Heto hiya ga?
S.TRANSL: Did he take a train to Taitung?

S.FORM: uya, pglux kisya musa Heto hiya.
S.TRANSL: Yes, he took a train to Taitung.

S.FORM: pglux kisya musa Heto hiya ga?
S.TRANSL: Did he take a train to Taitung?

S.FORM: iyat, pglux xikoki musa Tayto hiya.
S.TRANSL: No, he took a plane to Taitung.

S.FORM: maki eki basu bih cqani?
S.TRANSL: Is there a bus stop near here?

S.FORM: maki, musa su lasu cikay lga si ktli qa aki basu la.
S.TRANSL: 有，往前走就會看到公車站了。
Yes, if you go straight ahead, you will see the bus stop.

S.FORM: minas sobih na eki kisya cqani ga, cyan maki inu?
S.TRANSL: 離這裡最近的火車站在哪裡?
Where is the nearest train station to here?

S.FORM: uka aki kisya cqani, haya nanak hlgun su la.
S.TRANSL: 這裡沒有火車站，你只能坐計程車。
There is no train station here, you can only take a taxi.

S.FORM: glux basu ga knwan ptehok ta pqwasan biru?
S.TRANSL: How long does it take to get to the school by bus?

S.FORM: mpux magan pung baq tehok pqwasan biru.
glux kisya ga, akya knwan ptehok ta Taycyu?
S.TRANSL: 搭高鐵要多久時間會到臺中?
How long does it take to get to Taichung by THSR?

S.FORM: qutux tmucing lga baq tehok Taycyu.
S.TRANSL: I will come to Taichung in an hour.

S.FORM: qmuyut ta toruy musa Ulay ga baq bsyaq?
S.TRANSL: Is it a long drive to Ulai?

S.FORM: akya qutux tmucing baq tehoq.
glux su basu mwah muyax mu ga akya ktwa ryax?
S.TRANSL: 你搭公車來我家要多久?
How long did it take you to take the bus to my house?

S.FORM: aki cqa mpusan pung.
baq su qmet zitensya ga?
S.TRANSL: Do you know how to ride a bicycle?

S.FORM: baq cu qmet zitensya.
maki otobay su ga?
maki qutux otobay mu.
maki otobay su ga?
uka otobay mu.
ana misu tqbaqun cikay?
uya, smwan cu.
ana misu tqbaqun cikay?
iyat cu, ini kpiyux qbaqun mu.
S.TRANSL: Don’t, I don’t know much about it.

S.FORM: maki iyaw su qlyan qani ga? smoya cu musa mkan isu, pswan su?
S.TRANSL: 你下午有空嗎?我想去拜訪你可以嗎?
Are you free this afternoon? I’d like to visit you, is that okay?

S.FORM: uya, naw misu muyax.
S.TRANSL: Okay, I’ll wait for you at home.

S.FORM: maki iyaw su cyugan ga? akya misu tqbaqun iyaw Tayal cyunga.
S.TRANSL: 你明天有空嗎?我想請問你關於泰雅族的傳說故事。
Are you free tomorrow? I’d like to ask you about the legendary story of the Atayal.

S.FORM: musa cu rgyax cyugan, ini cu kaki muyax ay!
S.TRANSL: 明天我要去山上，不在家喔。
I’m going to the mountains tomorrow, so I won’t be home.

S.FORM: pnung mu ga, baqun su calay qabax iyaw na Tayal, smoya cu tqbaq cikay isu.
S.TRANSL: 我聽說您對泰雅族的傳統習俗非常了解，想要請教您一下。
I heard that you are very familiar with the traditional customs of the Atayal, I would like to ask you a question.

S.FORM: ini kpiyux ciyan qbaqun mu, ana ga tlamay mu kmayan.
S.TRANSL: 我所了解的不多，但是我會盡量回答。
I don’t know much about it, but I will try to answer as best I can.

S.FORM: ana misu psingun cikay? maha cqani ga baqun mu mmiru babaw nya. la.
S.TRANSL: 請問我可以錄影嗎?這樣以後比較容易記錄。
Can I record the video? It will be easier to record in the future.

S.FORM: uya ga, psingi cu.
pisa kawas su la?
qesu mpux lpgan spat kawas mu la.
sening su calay na.
ini ga, tyaba kawas mu la.
minkahol su inu?
knahol cu qalang Skikun.
S.TRANSL: I’m from [Four Seasons Village]. *Please change it to an ethnic location.

S.FORM: Tayal kneril su uyi?
S.TRANSL: 請問您的太太也是泰雅族人嗎?

S.FORM: iyat, Amis hiya.
nanu na ke ga baqun su kmayan?
baq cu kmayan ke na Tayal ru Truku.
S.TRANSL: 我會說泰雅語和太魯閣語。
I can speak Atayal and Telugu.

S.FORM: mqas cu calay mwah tqbaq isu, lani pinquyu cikay gaga na qmalup qani ga
S.TRANSL: 今天很高興能訪問您，請您談一下，有關狩獵的禁忌好嗎?
It’s a pleasure to interview you today, can you talk about the taboo of hunting?

S.FORM: uya pqiyay misu, garin cu sening na ga, si cu usa qmalup rgyax kryax.
S.TRANSL: 好的。我年輕的時候很常上山打獵。
Yes. I used to go hunting in the mountains when I was young.

S.FORM: mhway su calay, talagay kinblaq pinqiyan su coni qani.
S.TRANSL: 謝謝，您今天所教導的真是太棒了。
Thank you, what you taught me today was really great.

S.FORM: cbalay pinqiyan mu qani ay, snbilan ni bnheci myan cyunga.
S.TRANSL: 我所説的都是千真萬確的，祖先所流傳的講述。
All that I say is true, the sayings of my ancestors.

S.FORM: ski cqani tnbaqan misu la. mhway calay pinsbaq su qani.
S.TRANSL: 今天的訪談就到這邊。非常謝謝您的分享。
That’s all for today’s interview. Thank you very much for sharing with us.

S.FORM: ini, pkayan ta babaw nya loyi.
musa cu la, akya cu smoya mung piyux hayi iyaw qnxan cyunga.
S.TRANSL: 我要離開了，期待下次聽到更多的故事。
I’m going to leave now and look forward to hearing more stories next time.

S.FORM: uya, thway musa su ki.
lokah su, nanu besun su?
S.TRANSL: Hello, what do you want to buy?

S.FORM: pbes cu qutux kopu.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy a cup.

S.FORM: lokah su, nanu besun su?
S.TRANSL: Hello, what do you want to buy?

S.FORM: pbes cu qutux qbubu.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy a hat.

S.FORM: pbes cu kopu, cyan cimu tbes ga?
S.TRANSL: 我要買杯子，你們有賣嗎?
I want to buy a cup, do you sell them?

S.FORM: maki ay, pisa besun su?
S.TRANSL: Yes, how many do you want to buy?

S.FORM: cyan cimu tbes binro uyi ga?
ini ay, ini cami tbes binro.
S.TRANSL: No, we don't sell betel nut.

S.FORM: pbes cu bwax.
pisa cnabu besum su?
S.TRANSL: How many packs do you want to buy?

S.FORM: biqi cu tyungan cnabu na bwax.
pbes cu ngahi.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy sweet potatoes.

S.FORM: wal suqun tbes ngahi myan la.
S.TRANSL: All the sweet potatoes are sold out.

S.FORM: pbes cu saying yuyut abura.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy two bottles of oil.

S.FORM: qutux calay yuyut nyan sthay la.
S.TRANSL: We only have one bottle left.

S.FORM: praxi cu mes cikay batu.
pisa batu besun su?
S.TRANSL: How many eggs do you want to buy?

S.FORM: pisa batu besun su?
S.TRANSL: How many eggs do you want to buy?

S.FORM: pbes cu mpux batu.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy ten eggs.

S.FORM: pbes cu saying nhol na nexi.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy two green onions.

S.FORM: tyugan nhol nyan sthay la, si ali qabax qani la.
S.TRANSL: There are three left, all for you!

S.FORM: pisa pila nya qutux cnabu na bwax qani?
S.TRANSL: How much is this bag of rice?

S.FORM: qutux cnabu ga, saying qbhol pila.
mpusan qutux pila qabax, mpusan pila biqi cu mica la.
mhway su calay.
qesu mpux lpgan magan pila cqani.
ptmwan cu mes loyi, thkun mu ski qutux kbhol pila.
S.TRANSL: I'll buy some more, and make up 100 yuan.

S.FORM: magan kbhol mpux pila qabax.
magan kbhol pila si cu hali kesan lga?
hmet ciyan la, hali cu khway hayi ga?
S.TRANSL: 這個太貴了，可以算便宜一點嗎?
It's too expensive, can you make it cheaper?

S.FORM: iyat kbaqun ay, wayal misu halan khway lay.
S.TRANSL: 不行，這個已經很便宜了。
No, this is already very cheap.

S.FORM: pbes cu qutux kasi qani.
S.TRANSL: I want this packet of cookies.

S.FORM: mtiyul pila nya qani, ato na besun su ga?
S.TRANSL: 這餅乾30元，還需要別的東西嗎?
$30 for the cookies, anything else you need?

S.FORM: ana cu ksiyux pila isu?
S.TRANSL: Can I borrow money from you?

S.FORM: uya ga! pisa pila ksyuxun su?
S.TRANSL: Yes! How much do you need?

S.FORM: wal mu kngyan maray pila la, ana cu ksiyux pila isu?
S.TRANSL: 我忘記帶錢了，我可以跟你借錢嗎?
I forgot to bring money, can I borrow money from you?

S.FORM: ini cu aray pila uyi ay!
S.TRANSL: I don’t have any money either!

S.FORM: wal mu kngyan maray pila la, ana cu ksiyux pila isu?
S.TRANSL: 我忘記帶錢了，我可以跟你借錢嗎?
I forgot to bring money, can I borrow money from you?

S.FORM: iyat cu, wal misu ksiyuxn pila cnxan na ru, ini su biqi kingan na.
S.TRANSL: 不要，上次借的錢你都還沒還我。
No, you haven’t paid me back the money you borrowed last time.

S.FORM: ana cu pksiyux lukus isu?
uya, agan kya nanak.
ana cu pksiyux biru isu?
wal mu ksyuxan cqa Ciwas la.
ksyuxay ta cikay zitensya su ga?
S.TRANSL: 請借給我你的腳踏車好嗎?
Can I borrow your bicycle, please?

S.FORM: uya ga, ana ga biqi cu loyi cyuxan ay.
S.TRANSL: Okay, but you have to give it back to me tomorrow.

S.FORM: mqwalax la, ini cu aray bruku, ksyugay ta bruku ga?
S.TRANSL: 下雨了，我沒有帶傘，借我傘好嗎?
It’s raining, I don’t have an umbrella, can you lend me your umbrella?

S.FORM: qutux nanak bruku mu, si ta squn pruku lga!
S.TRANSL: 我只有一把傘，我們一起撐吧!
I only have an umbrella, let’s stick together!

S.FORM: knsyuxan su cnxan na biru kingan qani, psyuxay misu la.
S.TRANSL: 這是你上次借我的書，還給你。
This is the book you borrowed from me last time, I give it back to you.

S.FORM: smoya su ktayux biru nanu loyi, kyali cu ay.
S.TRANSL: 還想看什麼書都可以跟我說。
You can tell me what else you want to read.

S.FORM: akya knwan psyuxun misu pila a?
S.TRANSL: When do I have to pay you back?

S.FORM: ana moku ha, pkyala ta maki pila su la.
S.TRANSL: 沒關係，你有錢的時候再說。
It doesn’t matter, you can talk about it when you have money.

S.FORM: biqun su knwan kingan. knsyuxan su pila mu la?
S.TRANSL: When are you going to pay me back?

S.FORM: psuyxay misu cyuxan.
S.TRANSL: I will return it to you tomorrow.

S.FORM: knwan biqun su biru mu lga?
S.TRANSL: When are you going to return my book?

S.FORM: iyat misu wal biqun chesa lga?
S.TRANSL: 我昨天不是已經還你了嗎?
Didn’t I return it to you yesterday?

S.FORM: ksyuxan su nya Kacu enpit qani ga?
S.TRANSL: Did Kacu lend you this pen?

S.FORM: uya, ksyuxan mu comi hiya qani.
S.TRANSL: Yes, I borrowed it from him today.

S.FORM: knsyux su Kacu enpit qani ga?
S.TRANSL: Did you borrow this pen from Kacu?

S.FORM: iyat ay, mnes ni yaya mu.
S.TRANSL: No, this is what mom bought.

S.FORM: uka cimu la, usa ksyux cikay cimu qa Pihu.
S.TRANSL: We’re out of salt, let’s go borrow some from Pihu.

S.FORM: uya, haqa cu ksyux hiya.
kayan Pisuy, biqi cu knsyuan nya pila kusa.
S.TRANSL: Go tell Panay to give me back my money.

S.FORM: pisa pila wal su nya ksyuxan ga?
S.TRANSL: How much does she owe you?

S.FORM: musa su inu?
musa cu kmuya ramat qmayah.
S.TRANSL: I’m going to plant vegetables in the garden.

S.FORM: cyan su mtiyaw nanu?
piyux ciyan k’man nya la, nyan cu smliyat k’man, pqsya cu kisa loyi.
S.TRANSL: 草太多了，我在砍草，等一下要澆水。
There's too much grass, I'm cutting it, I'll have to water it later.

S.FORM: praxi cu maray cikay soki ru karoh ga?
S.TRANSL: 幫我把鐮刀和鋤頭拿來好嗎?
Will you get my scythes and hoes, please?

S.FORM: cyan su siyan ninu.
cyan maki biyh na bakit qsya.
S.TRANSL: Put it next to the bucket.

S.FORM: wal su kmahun roq qani la?
S.TRANSL: Did you turn over the soil?

S.FORM: mica mu na scyukan roq qani, tmubul mu kisa la.
S.TRANSL: 我剛翻過土，等等要播種。
I just turned over the soil, and so on to sow seeds.

S.FORM: baqun kmut ramat mnuya su lga?
S.TRANSL: 你種的菜可以收成了嗎?
Are your vegetables ready to be harvested?

S.FORM: baqun kmut tmana qani la, iyat qbaqun hmikut sina qaca na ay.
S.TRANSL: 這裡的高麗菜可以收成了，那裡的昭和草就還不能收成。
The cabbage here is ready to be harvested, but the Showa grass there is not yet ready to be harvested.

S.FORM: wa! talagay piyux qnehuy su ngahi qani ay.
S.TRANSL: 哇!你挖了這麼多的地瓜。
(sighs) Wow! You dug up so many gourds.

S.FORM: praxi cu smi cqa qho ga?
S.TRANSL: Will you help me with the barn?

S.FORM: nanu cyan mamu ptiyawun?
nyan cami smi ami, pkiyap cami qulih.
S.TRANSL: We're releasing fishing nets to catch fish.

S.FORM: piyux qulih nya cqani ku?
piyux qulih wal miyuk cqa squyu qani la.
S.TRANSL: 魚簍裡已經抓了很多魚。
The fish basket has been full of fish.

S.FORM: maha cimu nanu kmiyap qulih krryax?
S.TRANSL: How do you usually catch fish?

S.FORM: sbu’ mu panat qa qulih qani.
S.TRANSL: I shoot fish with a spear.

S.FORM: musa su mu’ qbsinux ga, baq su pckaw bneloq ku?
S.TRANSL: Do you know how to hunt with a bow and arrow?

S.FORM: smi cu rusa kmiyap qbsinux hiya, kruma maray cu patus ki hoyil musa qmalup.
S.TRANSL: 我通常都是用陷阱抓獵物，偶爾也會拿槍帶狗狩獵。
I usually catch my prey with a trap, but occasionally I hunt with a gun and a dog.

S.FORM: tuqi na biyok qani
S.TRANSL: This is the road the boar took.

S.FORM: cwa su qbaqun?
qnapan na biyok qani, mica qbaqun mu maha, tuqi na biyok qani
S.TRANSL: 這是山豬的腳印，所以這是山豬所走的路。
These are the footprints of the boar, so this is the path the boar took.

S.FORM: halay ta mlaw rusa ta ha, hay cyan mciriq qbsinux lay.
S.TRANSL: 快去看我們的陷阱，好像抓到獵物了。
Go and see our trap, for it seems that we have caught our prey.

S.FORM: cwa su qbaqun?
nyan sokan qa hoyil mu la, na hay hayi glgay ta.
S.TRANSL: 狗好像聞到味道了。我們快跟過去。
The dog seems to have smelled it. Let's follow them.

S.FORM: nanu qqaya cyan su qblayun qaca?
S.TRANSL: 你正在製作的是什麼東西?

S.FORM: qani ga rangay, skiyap mu qolit.
S.TRANSL: 這是石壓式陷阱，用來抓老鼠的。
This is a stone trap, used to catch rats.

S.FORM: nanu qaya cyan su syan cqaca a?
S.TRANSL: 你放在那裡的是什麼東西?
What is that thing you put there?

S.FORM: qani ga skakay, skiyap myan para qani hiya.
S.TRANSL: 那是套腳式繩索陷阱，我們用它來抓山羌。
It was a leg-rigged rope trap, and we used it to catch Shankiang.

S.FORM: mhway calay knalu na utux bnheci, piyux calay qbsinux cniriq ta.
S.TRANSL: 感謝祖靈賜福，今天我們有很多獵物收獲。
Thanks to the blessing of our ancestors, we had a great harvest today.

S.FORM: uya wa! rayaw ta qalang ru pqtugay ta qabax naha!
S.TRANSL: 是啊!我們帶回部落好好分享吧!
Yeah! Let's take it back to the tribe and share it!

S.FORM: sesiy kisa ga sbaqay cimu son nanu kmayal lalu na qqsinux.
S.TRANSL: 今天老師要教大家動物的泰雅語怎麼說。
I will teach everyone all kinds of animals in Tayal language today.

S.FORM: sesiy kisa ga sbaqay cimu qabax lalu na k’man.
S.TRANSL: 今天老師要教大家植物的泰雅語怎麼說。

S.FORM: sesiy kisa ga sbaqay cimu lalu na bway kkhoniq.
S.TRANSL: 今天老師要教大家水果的泰雅語怎麼說。
I will teach everyone all kinds of fruits in Tayal language today.

S.FORM: laxi abi.
laxi kcyang.
laxi maniq nniqun.
agal biru su.
agal enpit su.
agal bbiru su.
sku biru.
sku enpit.
sku nniqun.
sku qqaya csalan qaca.
ima enpit qani?
araw mu.
ima biru qani?
arwa ni pasang qani.
ima ccom qaca?
ini mu kbaqi.
lukus ni watan qaca?
iyat oba ni yukan qani.
sesiy ini cu aray biru.
S.TRANSL: Teacher, I didn’t bring my textbook.

S.FORM: psqun ktayux ki seto su.
S.TRANSL: Share the book with your classmate next to you.

S.FORM: nyan mpahux enpit mu la.
brwani binah na mtasiq enpit.
uka ccom mu la.
ksyugi ccom mu.
S.TRANSL: I will lend you my eraser.

S.FORM: masoq cami mqwas la, thuway mhkangi musa muyax.
S.TRANSL: 我們要下課了，回家路上要小心。
It is the end of the class, be careful on your way home.

S.FORM: uya, mhuway su sesiy.
masoq cami mqwas biru la, sgagay ta la.
S.TRANSL: 我們要下課了，大家再見。
The class is over, goodbye everyone.

S.FORM: sgagay ta la sesiy.
lokah ta qabax, lalu mu ga Batu.
S.TRANSL: Hello everyone, my name is Batu.

S.FORM: Batu nyan su lokah.
lokah ta qabax, lalu mu ga Pasang.
S.TRANSL: Hello everyone, my name is Pasang.

S.FORM: Pasang nyan su lokah ga.
nyan su lokah ga kingan ga Yumin.
Yumin nyan su lokah ga kingan ga Yaway.
nyan su lokah ga kingan ga Hayung.
Hayung nyan su lokah ga kingan ga Yayut.
ima isu?
kingan ga yaya cu ni Pasang, kingan ga Yaway.
ima isu?
swahi cu ni Takun, lalu mu ga Yayut.
S.TRANSL: 我是Takun的妹妹，我的名字是Yayut。
I am Takun’s sister. My name is Yayut.

S.FORM: ima hiya?
hiya ga sesiy mu psbaq biru, lalu nya ga Temu.
ima lalu cquliq qaca?
qbsuyan mu mlikuy qaca, lalu nya ga Bsyaw.
hiya Pasang ga?
uya, hiya ga Pasang.
isu Pasang ga?
iyat, kingan ga Losing.
ima Pasang hiya?
kingan ga Pasang.
ima Yukan hiya?
Yukan ga rangi mu.
ima lalu qbsuyan su kneril?
S.TRANSL: What is your elder sister’s name?

S.FORM: Yabung lalu ni qbsuyan mu kneril.
S.TRANSL: My elder sister’s name is Yabung.

S.FORM: ima lalu swahi su kneril hiya?
S.TRANSL: What is your younger sister’s name?

S.FORM: Kumu lalu ni swahi mu kneril hiya.
S.TRANSL: My younger sister’s name is Kumu.

S.FORM: baqun su lalu ni hiya?
lalu nya ga Pihu.
pisa kawas ni qbsuyan su mlikuy?
S.TRANSL: How old is your elder brother?

S.FORM: mpux magan kawas nya la.
pisa kawas ni swahi su mlikuy?
S.TRANSL: How old is your younger brother?

S.FORM: magan kawas nya hiya.
qalang mamu ga maki pqwasan biru kya?
S.TRANSL: Do you have schools in your community?

S.FORM: maki.
mnqwas su pqwasan biru kya qalang su?
S.TRANSL: 你在部落的學校讀書嗎?
Do you study in your tribe’s school?

S.FORM: uya, mqwas biru kya ga yani hayi qutux muyax.
S.TRANSL: 是的，在學校讀書我們像一家人。
Yes, we are like family while we are studying at school.

S.FORM: ima lalu nya mlikuy qaca?
hiya ga mama mu.
ima lalu nya kneril qaca?
hiya ga qbsuyan mu kneril.
ima lalu nya laqi qaca?
hiya ga swahi mu mlikuy.
nanu cyan ptyawun ni yaya su?
S.TRANSL: 你的媽媽從事什麼工作?

S.FORM: hiya ga cyan alan mnhuw hetay.
nanu cyan ptyawan ni yaba su hiya?
S.TRANSL: 你的爸爸從事什麼工作?

S.FORM: cya alan sesiy.
hiya ga swahi su mlikuy?
iyat, hiya ga rangi ni swahi mu.
S.TRANSL: 不是， 他是我弟弟的朋友。
No, he is my younger brother’s friend.

S.FORM: hiya qbsuyan su kneril?
iyat, hiya ga swahi mu kneril.
S.TRANSL: No, she is my younger sister.

S.FORM: pisa qabax he muyax naha?
S.TRANSL: How many people in their family?

S.FORM: magan he qabax muyax naha.
S.TRANSL: There are five people in their family.

S.FORM: pisa qabax he laqi muyax mamu?
S.TRANSL: How many children in your family?

S.FORM: payat he qabax laqi myan.
S.TRANSL: There are four children in our family.

S.FORM: pisa qabax swahi su?
S.TRANSL: How many younger siblings do you have?

S.FORM: uka mlikuy, maki tyugan swahi kneril.
S.TRANSL: 我沒有弟弟，有三位妹妹。
I don’t have any younger brothers, but I have three younger sisters.

S.FORM: pisa qbsuyan su hiya?
S.TRANSL: How many older siblings do you have?

S.FORM: uka qbsuyan mu.
S.TRANSL: I don’t have any older siblings.

S.FORM: pisa qabax rawil su?
S.TRANSL: How many siblings do you have?

S.FORM: uka rawil mu.
mtrawil cimu?
uya, hiya ga qbsuyan mu mlikuy.
cimu ga Tayal?
uya, cami ga Tayal.
Tayal hiya uyi?
uya, Tayal hiya uyi.
hmcwa kayan coni?
ghiyaq hayi kayal, klokah mnbux kilux qsya.
S.TRANSL: 天氣有點冷，要多喝熱水。
It’s a bit cold, so you need to drink more warm water.

S.FORM: maha nanu kayan coni?
mkilux hayi kayan, klokah mnbux qsya.
S.TRANSL: It’s a bit hot, so you need to drink more water.

S.FORM: maha nanu kayan te tanux coni?
tyaba wagi nya, qblaq mlahang he.
S.TRANSL: The sun is bright and remember to wear sunscreen.

S.FORM: maha nanu kayan te tanux coni?
piyux yulung nya, uka wagi nya.
S.TRANSL: There are a lot of clouds but no sun in the sky.

S.FORM: maha nanu kayan cugan?
uka wagi nya cugan, piyux yulung, tyaba behuy.
S.TRANSL: 明天沒有太陽，雲很多，風很大。
It will be cloudy and windy but not sunny tomorrow.

S.FORM: mnha nanu kayan nya ryax qaca?
S.TRANSL: How was the weather that day?

S.FORM: ghiyaq ryax qani, kpiyux mlukus musa su tanux.
S.TRANSL: 這天有點冷，出門要穿外套。
It was a bit cold and you needed to wear a jacket when you went outside.

S.FORM: ryax hngawan qani maha nanu kayan nya?
S.TRANSL: How’s the weather on the weekend?

S.FORM: ryax hngawan qani ga blaq kayan.
S.TRANSL: It will be sunny on the weekend.

S.FORM: pqwalax ryax na qaca?
S.TRANSL: Will it be rainy that day?

S.FORM: ryax qaca ga blaq kayan nya, iyat pqwalax.
S.TRANSL: 那天天氣晴朗，不會下雨。
It will have no rain and be sunny that day.

S.FORM: pqwalax ryax na qaca?
S.TRANSL: Will it be rainy that day?

S.FORM: uya, pqwalax ryax na qaca.
S.TRANSL: Yes, it will be rainy that day.

S.FORM: nyan qmwalax mwani?
mswat qwalax nya la, phtux wagi la.
S.TRANSL: The rain stops and the sun comes out.

S.FORM: nyan qmwalax mwani?
qmwalax la, ini cu aray bruku.
S.TRANSL: It is raining and I don’t have an umbrella with me.

S.FORM: cyan qmwalax te tanux?
ini qwalax mwani, babaw knryax ga baq mqwalax, aray bruku.
S.TRANSL: 現在沒有下雨，中午過後會下雨，出門要帶傘。
It is not raining now, but it will be rainy in the afternoon, so you need to bring an umbrella when you go out.

S.FORM: qmisan kawas ga mwah ghiyaq kayan nya?
S.TRANSL: Will it be very cold in winter next year?

S.FORM: uya, qmisan kawas ga mwah ghiyaq, kpiyux mlukus kya.
S.TRANSL: 是，明年冬天會很冷，要穿很多衣服。
Yes, it will be very cold in winter next year, so you need to put on extra layers.

S.FORM: ’bagan pilax qani ga baq mkilux kayan nya?
S.TRANSL: Will it be very hot in summer this year?

S.FORM: uya, baq mkilux kayan nya, klokah mnbux qsya.
S.TRANSL: 是，夏天會很熱，要多喝水。
Yes, it will be very hot and you need to drink more water.

S.FORM: smoya su ryax na tmangux abax?
smoya cu ryax na tmangux abax, kkilux kayan nya.
S.TRANSL: 我喜歡春天，天氣很溫暖。
I like spring because the weather is warm.

S.FORM: smoya su ryax na hoqan abax?
ini cu soya ryax na hoqan abax, piyux bbehuy nya.
S.TRANSL: 我不喜歡秋天，秋天有好多颱風。
I don’t like autumn because there are lots of typhoons in autumn.

S.FORM: mingi cu maray biru la.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring the textbook.

S.FORM: psqun ta ktayux ki.
S.TRANSL: I will share it with you.

S.FORM: mingi cu maray ccom la.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring the eraser.

S.FORM: pksyugay misu.
mingi su maray enpit ga?
S.TRANSL: Do you forget to bring your pen?

S.FORM: uya, pksyugi cu enpit su ki?
S.TRANSL: Yes, can you lend me a pen?

S.FORM: nanu niqun su pkryax hiya?
S.TRANSL: What would you like for lunch?

S.FORM: pkaniq cu pang menpaw.
nanu niqun su kgabi hiya?
S.TRANSL: What would you like for dinner?

S.FORM: qaniq cu mami.
nanu wayan su niqun knama?
S.TRANSL: What did you have for breakfast?

S.FORM: mnaniq cu batu.
mnaniq su nanu knryax?
S.TRANSL: What did you have for lunch?

S.FORM: maniq cu he ngta.
hata tqiyay boru.
usa nama isu, musa cu hkangi isu kisa.
S.TRANSL: 你先去，我等一下去找你。
You go first and I will catch up later.

S.FORM: hata mlngyaq gong ha.
uya ga psqun ta musa.
hata cisan boru.
iyat, hata lmeliq bbiru ha.
S.TRANSL: No, we have to carry books first.

S.FORM: knugus su pniq la?
ini na, nyan cu qmwax pyatu.
S.TRANSL: Not yet. I am doing the dishes.

S.FORM: wan su qmwax nqwaq la ga?
S.TRANSL: Did you rinse out your mouth?

S.FORM: wan cu qmwax nqwaq la.
S.TRANSL: Yes, I rinsed out my mouth.

S.FORM: wan su qwaxan pyatu la?
wan mu qwaxan pyatu mu la.
cyu su ini pema qba?
S.TRANSL: Why didn’t you wash your hands?

S.FORM: pema cu kisa.
S.TRANSL: I will wash my hands later.

S.FORM: cya su hmcwa coni?
S.TRANSL: What were you doing just now?

S.FORM: mnwah cu hkangi sesiy.
S.TRANSL: I went to meet the teacher.

S.FORM: masoq su mqwas biru laga phcwa su la?
S.TRANSL: What are you going to do after school?

S.FORM: musa cu muyax la.
masoq mqwas biru hiya ga musa inu?
S.TRANSL: What is she doing after school?

S.FORM: musa mstopaw myugi hiya.
S.TRANSL: She is going to go dancing.

S.FORM: Sayun cyan su maki muyax?
uya, uwah cka.
Yabung, cyan su maki muyax?
ini kaki muyax Yabung ay! kingan ga Ipay, maki yaw ga? mwah ga kyalaw mu Yabung.
S.TRANSL: Yabung不在家耶！我是Ipay，有什麼事嗎？回來我會轉告Yabung。
Yabung is not at home. I am Ipay. What can I do for you? I will let him know when he comes back.

S.FORM: cimu ga ima lalu?
Yaki, cami ga yaway ki yayut, gwahi blihun ha.
S.TRANSL: 奶奶，我們是yaway和yayut，幫我們開門。
Grandma, we are yaway and yayut, please open the door for us.

S.FORM: ima a?
kingan ga Toli, nyan cu mwah khangi Yukan.
S.TRANSL: I am Toli, I am here for Yukan.

S.FORM: Yaki nyan cu mwah mkan mlaw isu la.
S.TRANSL: Grandma, I am here to see you.

S.FORM: bsyaq su ini uwah la, krmatun misu calay.
S.TRANSL: 你好久沒來了，我好想念你。
You haven’t been here for a long time. I missed you so much.

S.FORM: Kumu, nyan cu mwah cisan isu la.
S.TRANSL: Kumu, I am here to play with you.

S.FORM: nahay uwah cka, bsyaq misu mna la.
S.TRANSL: Come on in! I have been waiting for you for a long time.

S.FORM: nuya mu ngahi qani, tlami maniq.
S.TRANSL: 這是我種的地瓜，吃吃看。
This is the sweet potato I grow. Try it!

S.FORM: lbing niqun ngahi qani.
S.TRANSL: The sweet potato is so sweet.

S.FORM: uwah! qani ga pinnuya mu bway khoniq, tlami maniq.
S.TRANSL: 過來!這是我種的水果，吃看看。
Come here! These are the fruits I grow. You should try it.

S.FORM: lbing bway khoniq qani.
tama! qani ga nuya mu qcyay tlami maniq!
S.TRANSL: 請坐!這是我種的有機玉米吃看看!
Take a seat! You should try some organic corn that I grow.

S.FORM: u! lbing calay niqun qcyay qani.
S.TRANSL: Wow! The corn tastes so sweet.

S.FORM: qaniq su unak ga?
iyat cu kaniq unak, kaniq cu ringo hiya.
S.TRANSL: 我不能吃橘子，我吃蘋果就好。
I can’t eat oranges. I will have some apples instead.

S.FORM: kaniq su pinkan ga?
uya, siyan mu maniq.
S.TRANSL: Sure, I like it very much.

S.FORM: taqay mu bway khoniq pniqay misu.
S.TRANSL: Let me peel the fruit for you.

S.FORM: mhuway su, piyux boq bway khoniq qani.
S.TRANSL: Thank you. This fruit is so juicy.

S.FORM: mala cu qsya pbuxay misu.
S.TRANSL: I will bring you some water.

S.FORM: mhuway su.
klokah maniq, piyux hnapuy mu rramat.
S.TRANSL: Enjoy yourself. I cooked a lot of dishes.

S.FORM: u! shiya calay niqun.
S.TRANSL: 嗚! 真的很香也好吃。
Oh! It smells good and looks delicious.

S.FORM: klokah maniq, piyux ramat nyan na.
S.TRANSL: Enjoy yourself. There is a lot more.

S.FORM: han, mhuway su.
klokah maniq, piyux ramat nyan na.
S.TRANSL: Enjoy yourself. There are plenty here.

S.FORM: piyux wan mu niqun la, iyat cu kaniq la.
S.TRANSL: 我吃了好多，不能再吃了。
I ate a lot and couldn’t eat any more.

S.FORM: kisa sesiy ga rayun cimu nya rgyax.
S.TRANSL: 老師今天要帶你們去山上。
I will take you to the mountains today.

S.FORM: kmayan Yaya maha piyux kuy rgyax.
S.TRANSL: 媽媽說山上有很多蚊子。
Mom says that there are lots of mosquitoes in the mountains.

S.FORM: kisa sesiy ga rayun cimu nya qmayah.
S.TRANSL: 老師今天要帶你們去田裡。
I will take you to the fields.

S.FORM: musa ta tmaroq mqumah ga?
S.TRANSL: Are we going to loosen the soil?

S.FORM: musa ta inu kisa?
rayun ta nya gong sesiy.
S.TRANSL: Teacher will take us to the riverside.

S.FORM: musa ta inu kisa?
rayun ta nya rgyax sesiy.
S.TRANSL: Teacher will take us to the mountains today.

S.FORM: musa ta gong kisa ga?
S.TRANSL: Are we going to the riverside today?

S.FORM: iyat, rayun ta nya rgyax sesiy.
S.TRANSL: 不是，老師要帶我們去山上。
No, our teacher is going to take us to the mountains.

S.FORM: musa ta rgyax kisa ga?
S.TRANSL: Are we going to the mountains today?

S.FORM: iyat, musa ta qmayah kisa.
S.TRANSL: 不是，我們今天要去田裡。
No, we are going to the fields.

S.FORM: sesiy, musa ta mangay nanu kya gong?
S.TRANSL: 老師，我們到河邊要看什麼?
Teacher, what are we going to see at the riverside?

S.FORM: musa ta mangay tung mlaka kya.
S.TRANSL: We are going to see dragonflies.

S.FORM: sesiy, nanu salun ta mangay kya rgyax?
S.TRANSL: 老師，我們到山上要看什麼?
Teacher, what are we going to see in the mountains?

S.FORM: musa ta mangay cyocyo qpiray.
S.TRANSL: We are going to see butterflies.

S.FORM: musa ta mtiyaw nanu kya qmayah?
S.TRANSL: What are we going to do in the fields?

S.FORM: musa ta muya qcyay kya qmayah, pnbaq ki maki paru nya ru uying ay.
S.TRANSL: 我們要到田裡看我們種的玉米，要小心有螞蟻、蜜蜂唷。
We are going to see the corn we grow in the fields, but you need to be aware of the ants and bees.

S.FORM: sesiy musa ta mlngyaq kya gong ga?
S.TRANSL: 老師我們要到河邊游泳嗎?
Teacher, are we going to swim in the river?

S.FORM: iyat, musa ta mangay ’tung kya.
S.TRANSL: No, we are going to see dragonflies.

S.FORM: sesiy, musa ta muya rramat kya qmayah ga?
S.TRANSL: 老師我們要到田裡種菜嗎?
Teacher, are we going to grow some vegetables in the fields?

S.FORM: musa ta tmaroq kmayah kya.
S.TRANSL: We are going to loosen the soil today.

S.FORM: cyan mlaka kya ’tung nya.
coni nanak na kintayux cu minqyanux na ’tung na.
S.TRANSL: 我今天才看過真正活著的蜻蜓。
Today is the first time I see real living dragonflies.

S.FORM: cyan mlaka kya cyocyo qpiray.
wa! siyan mu calay cyocyo qpiray qani, betunux calay.
S.TRANSL: Yeh! Wow! I love butterflies. They are very beautiful.

S.FORM: cyan mlaka kya cyocyo qpiray.
iyat cyocyo qpiray qaca, qaca ga uying.
S.TRANSL: Those are not butterflies. They are bees.

S.FORM: wah mangay cqani, laxi usa thiyaq ay!
S.TRANSL: 在這裡看一看，不要到太遠的地方唷!
Come here and take a look. Don’t go too far!

S.FORM: uya, iyat cami qbaq musa thiyaq.
S.TRANSL: 好，我們不會去太遠的地方。
Got it, we won’t go anywhere too far.

S.FORM: laxi ktlyum ki, thuway hmkani ptakuy cimu la.
S.TRANSL: 不要用跑的，慢慢走免得跌倒了。
Don’t run and walk slowly lest you fall down.

S.FORM: smoya cami maha nway helax ktalan.
S.TRANSL: I want to see them right away.

S.FORM: maha su nanu musa saliq?
S.TRANSL: How do you go to the block-house?

S.FORM: qmuyit cu toruy musa qmayah.
maha nanu musa byo’ing hiya?
S.TRANSL: How does he go to the hospital?

S.FORM: mhkangi musa byo’ing hiya.
gmlux su nanu musa ponxu?
S.TRANSL: How do you go to Penghu?

S.FORM: gmlux cu kacu plaka.
S.TRANSL: I go to Penghu by plane.

S.FORM: gmlux su nanu musa ponxu?
S.TRANSL: How do you go to Penghu?

S.FORM: gmlux cu kacu gune musa ponxu.
S.TRANSL: I go to Penghu by boat.

S.FORM: gmlux su nanu mwah muyax?
gmlux cu basu renki mwah muyax.
Sayun gmlux su nanu mwah mqwas biru?
S.TRANSL: How does Sayun go to school?

S.FORM: gmlux kisya mwah mqwas biru qa Sayun.
S.TRANSL: Sayun goes to school by train.

S.FORM: Yukan ga gmlux nanu musa kyokay?
S.TRANSL: How does Yukan go to church?

S.FORM: gmlux zitensya mwah kyokay qa Yukan.
S.TRANSL: Yukan goes to church by bicycle.

S.FORM: gmlux su renki basu musa mqwas biru?
S.TRANSL: Do you go to school by MRT?

S.FORM: iyat, gmlux cu basu mwah mqwas biru.
S.TRANSL: No, I go to school by bus.

S.FORM: qmuyit su zitensya mwah mqwas biru?
S.TRANSL: Do you go to school by bicycle?

S.FORM: uya, qmuyit cu zitensya mwah mqwas biru.
S.TRANSL: Yes, I go to school by bicycle.

S.FORM: gmlux su kawtey kisya musa takaw?
S.TRANSL: Do you go to Kaohsiung by High Speed Rail?

S.FORM: uya, gmlux cu kawtey kisya musa takaw.
S.TRANSL: Yes, I go to Kaohsiung by High Speed Rail.

S.FORM: musa su takaw ga gmlux su kisya ini ga kacu plaka?
S.TRANSL: 你去高雄搭火車還是搭飛機?
Are you going to Taitung by train or by plane?

S.FORM: gmlux cu kacu plaka, thuway qa kisya hiya.
S.TRANSL: 我搭飛機，搭飛機比搭火車快。
I will take the plane because it is faster than the train.

S.FORM: musa su kyokay ga gmlux su basu, ini ga qmuyit su toruy nanak?
S.TRANSL: 你去教會搭公車還是開車?
Are you going to drive to the church or take the bus?

S.FORM: qmuyit cu toruy musa kyokay, thuway gmlux basu hiya.
S.TRANSL: 我開車去教會，開車比搭公車方便。
I will drive to the church because it is more convenient than the bus.

S.FORM: ksobih muyax mamu tbesan qeqaya?
S.TRANSL: Is the market close to your house?

S.FORM: thiyaq hayi, qmuyit cu otobay musa kya tbbesan.
S.TRANSL: 不近，我都騎摩托車去超市。
No, it is not, so I always ride the motorcycle to the market.

S.FORM: ksobih kya pqwasan biru qa sskwan pila?
S.TRANSL: Is the post office close to the school?

S.FORM: sobih, hkangi lga tehok la.
S.TRANSL: Yes, it is within walking distance.

S.FORM: ksobih kya eki basu nniqan?
S.TRANSL: Is the restaurant close to the station?

S.FORM: mhtux su eki basu lga, kya hayi magan cpung lga tehok la.
S.TRANSL: 出車站再走五分鐘就到了。
It only takes five minutes after you walk out of the station.

S.FORM: maki ryax hngawan su?
hmcwa ga?
wah cu mkan isu.
S.TRANSL: I would like to visit you.

S.FORM: maki yaw mu coni iyat cu paki muyax. babaw nya ki.
S.TRANSL: 我今天有事不在家。改天吧。
I am out today. How about another day?

S.FORM: phngaw su cugan hiya ga? babaw knryax halay misu khangi.
S.TRANSL: 那你明天有空嗎?我下午去找你。
Then, are you available tomorrow? I’ll visit you tomorrow afternoon.

S.FORM: uya ga nnay misu muyax.
S.TRANSL: Sure, I will wait for you at home.

S.FORM: pqutay misu ana cu musa magan hngya’an? sskwan mu.
S.TRANSL: 請問我可以錄音嗎?我想做紀錄。
Would you mind if I do the voice recording? I would like to keep a record.

S.FORM: uya ga, wali nanu.
ana cu magan syasing?
S.TRANSL: Would you mind if I do the video recording?

S.FORM: ini cu kbtunux ktalan, ru ini mu spyuci qa sskwan qeqaya, ana moqu la.
S.TRANSL: 我不好看，倉庫也沒整理，不要啦。
No, I am plain and the warehouse hasn’t been tidied up yet.

S.FORM: nanu si cu psyasing nanak la.
S.TRANSL: Then I will just take photos.

S.FORM: laxi psyasing uyi.
mhuway su baqun misu maqut kmayan.
S.TRANSL: Thank you for accepting the interview.

S.FORM: wali nanu, nanu pqutun su kmayan?
S.TRANSL: You are welcome. What would you like to know?

S.FORM: mrkyas su cyunga ga nanu pintyawan su?
S.TRANSL: 請問您年輕時是做什麼的?
What do you do when you are young?

S.FORM: nalan cu knsat cyunga, ana ga nyan cu mhngaw la.
S.TRANSL: 我以前是警察，但我現在退休了。
I was a police officer but I am retired now.

S.FORM: mwani ga cyan su mtiyaw na?
S.TRANSL: Then, are you working at the moment?

S.FORM: nyan cu mtiyaw gako pqwasan biru.
pqutay misu kmayan, cyan maki qalang laqi su uyi?
S.TRANSL: 請問您的孩子也住在部落嗎?
Do your kids live in the tribe too?

S.FORM: ini, laqi mu ga maki kya qalang te hogan.
S.TRANSL: 不，我的孩子在都市居住。
No, my kids are all living in the city.

S.FORM: isu nanak maki kya?
S.TRANSL: Then, do you live by yourself?

S.FORM: cyan cu qmayat qutux hoyil ru qutux qbhniq, naha ga qutux muyax myan uyi.
S.TRANSL: 我還有養一隻狗和一隻鳥，他們也是我的家人。
I also keep a dog and a bird. They are my family.

S.FORM: cyan cu qmayat qutux ngyaw uyi, msbes ki qinyatan ga baq mlhax.
S.TRANSL: 我也有養一隻貓，有動物陪伴不會無聊。
I have a cat too. I won’t get bored with the company of my pet.

S.FORM: pqutay misu kmayan kura yaw na psaniq gaga na pqalup.
S.TRANSL: 我想請問你關於打獵的禁忌。
I would like to ask you about the taboos of hunting.

S.FORM: ini kpiyux ciyan qbaqun mu, ana ga ktwa qnbaq mu ga kyalaw misu.
S.TRANSL: 我知道的不多，但我能回答的都會回答你。
I don’t know much about that, but I will tell you everything I know.

S.FORM: qeqaya na pqalup mamu, maki psaniq nya uyi?
S.TRANSL: 你們打獵的武器有什麼禁忌嗎?
Do you have any taboos about hunting weapons?

S.FORM: qeqaya pqalup myan qani ga ini tringi na kneril.
S.TRANSL: 我們打獵的武器不可以讓女生碰到。
Our hunting weapons are untouchable to women.

S.FORM: ana msqun cimu kneril musa qmalup uyi?
S.TRANSL: 那女人可以一起去打獵嗎?
Then, can women go hunting together?

S.FORM: ini, kneril ga ini kbaq qmalup psaniq.
S.TRANSL: 不行，女人也不可以打獵。
No, women cannot go hunting either.

S.FORM: Pasang, uka qwaw muyax la, usa mes bicyu isu.
S.TRANSL: Pasang，家裡沒有米酒了，你去買米酒。
Pasang, our home is out of rice wine, please go and buy some.

S.FORM: cinuyuk maki qutux yuyut na, ana ini usa mbes.
S.TRANSL: 廚房裡還有一瓶，不用買吧。
There is still one bottle left in the kitchen, so there is no need to buy one!

S.FORM: ini ktnaq qutux yuyut, usa mbes saying yuyut loyi ha.
S.TRANSL: 一瓶不夠，再去買兩瓶回來。
One bottle is not enough for me, go and buy two more back.

S.FORM: pbes cu qwaw, cyan cimu ptbes?
S.TRANSL: 我要買米酒，你們有賣嗎?
I am looking for rice wine. Do you have any rice wine?

S.FORM: maki, pisa besun su?
S.TRANSL: Yes! How many bottles do you need?

S.FORM: saying yuyut, ru qutux cnabu bwax.
S.TRANSL: 我要買兩瓶，還要買一包米。
I want two bottles and a pack of rice.

S.FORM: nyan cqani bwax, nanu bbesun su loyi?
S.TRANSL: 米在這裡，你還需要什麼嗎?
Here is the rice, what else do you need?

S.FORM: pbes cu batu, maki?
S.TRANSL: I want some eggs too, do you have some?

S.FORM: wayan suqun mbes batu myan la.
pbes cu lukus.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy some clothes.

S.FORM: nanu qa siyon su lukus?
S.TRANSL: What kind of clothes do you like?

S.FORM: pbes cu r’tung qugux nya.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy the clothes with short sleeves.

S.FORM: hmcwa mtalah qani hiya?
maki minnanak patas uyi?
maki mlabu ru mgwasiq.
S.TRANSL: We have white and blue ones too.

S.FORM: bqani cu qutux mgwasiq na lukus.
S.TRANSL: 請給我一件藍色的衣服。
Please give me the clothes in blue.

S.FORM: Pasang, mnwah su inu coni? nwah su phlah he ga?
S.TRANSL: Pasang，你剛剛去哪裡了?你去運動嗎?
Pasang, where have you been just now? Did you go exercising?

S.FORM: ini, nwah cu rmax yaki mbes ramat.
S.TRANSL: No, I went grocery shopping for my grandma.

S.FORM: han maha kya ga, nanu yaw su gbyan? hata msqun maniq.
S.TRANSL: 這樣啊，你晚上有沒有空?要不要和我一起吃飯。
No wonder! Are you available at night? Would you like to have a meal with me?

S.FORM: iyat ay, musa cu mbes lukus.
S.TRANSL: No, I want to buy some clothes.

S.FORM: nanu squn cu isu musa.
S.TRANSL: Then, I will go with you.

S.FORM: rangi, pisa pila qutux hnblan ramat qani?
S.TRANSL: 你好，請問這把菜多少錢?
Hello, how much is this bunch of vegetables?

S.FORM: pusan pila qutux hinblan.
S.TRANSL: The vegetables are $20 for a bunch.

S.FORM: pisa pila ngahi qani?
S.TRANSL: How much are these sweet potatoes?

S.FORM: qutux tngcing ga mtiyul pila qa ngahi.
S.TRANSL: Sweet potatoes are thirty dollars for a pound.

S.FORM: bqani cu saying hinblan ramat ki qutux tngcing ngahi.
S.TRANSL: 請給我兩把菜和一斤地瓜。
Please give me two bunches of vegetables and a pound of sweet potatoes.

S.FORM: Toli, mngi cu maray enpit la, ksyuxi cu cikay ki?
S.TRANSL: Toli，我忘了帶筆，你可以借我嗎?
Toli, I forgot to bring my pen. Can you lend me one?

S.FORM: uka kingan uyi, arwa ni Kumu qani.
S.TRANSL: I don’t have one either. This is Kumu’s.

S.FORM: ana ga ksyuxay ta cikay ki? masoq lga bqanun misu la.
S.TRANSL: 那可以借我一下子嗎?我很快就還你。
Can you lend me the pen for a second? I will return to you immediately.

S.FORM: uya, agan ga.
mhuway su, mhuway su kusa Kumu uyi ki.
S.TRANSL: Thank you and thank Kumu for me.

S.FORM: nanu siyon su cukaw?
mwah cu matu kinsyuxan mu saying bbiru.
S.TRANSL: I want to return these two books.

S.FORM: uya, maki na siyon su cukaw na?
S.TRANSL: No problem and what else do you need?

S.FORM: ksiyux cu tyugan bbiru loyi.
S.TRANSL: I would like to borrow these three books.

S.FORM: uya ga. tyugan nabi lga kngyay su mwah matu.
S.TRANSL: 好了。記得三天後要拿來還。
Sure and remember to return them after three days.

S.FORM: ini su sali matu na ccom mu.
S.TRANSL: You haven’t returned me the eraser.

S.FORM: wan mu biqan chesa la.
cyu wayan uka ccom mu la.
S.TRANSL: 那我的橡皮擦怎麼不見了。
Then, why is my eraser missing?

S.FORM: una su wayan ksyuxan Pasang la.
S.TRANSL: Did you lend it to Pasang?

S.FORM: ini mu baqi. Salay mu kmayan hiya.
S.TRANSL: I don’t know. I will go and ask her.

S.FORM: pksyuxay misu ccom mu ha.
S.TRANSL: I will lend you my eraser first.

S.FORM: Kumu, lukus khmay qani ga kinsyuxan su ni Pihu ga?
S.TRANSL: Kumu, did Pihu lend you this coat?

S.FORM: iyat ,bnesan cu ni yaya mu.
S.TRANSL: 不是，這是我媽媽買給我的
No, my mom bought it for me.

S.FORM: zyanba ni Pihu ga mtnaq cimu.
S.TRANSL: Pihu’s coat is the same as yours.

S.FORM: mqatung qa zyanba nya, ini ptnaq patas myan.
S.TRANSL: 他的外套是黑色的，我們的顏色不一樣。
His coat is black, so our colors are different.

S.FORM: Yaway, wan su ksiyux pila ni Pasang?
S.TRANSL: Yaway, did you borrow money from Pasang?

S.FORM: uya, calay ga akay mu biqan coni hiya, mingi cu maray pila la.
S.TRANSL: 有，我本來今天要還他，我忘記帶錢了。
Yes, I was supposed to return to him today, but I forgot to bring the money.

S.FORM: knwan qa biqun su?
S.TRANSL: Then, when will you return the money?

S.FORM: cugan qa biqun mu hiya.
S.TRANSL: I will return to him tomorrow.

S.FORM: uya, kyalaw mu Pasang ga.
S.TRANSL: Okay, I will tell Pasang for you.

S.FORM: qolit qani ga smi rangay criqun, pqocya hiya ga criqun psqolu ini ga pskakay, qani qa cbalay.
S.TRANSL: 老鼠應該要⽤⽯壓式陷阱抓，⽵雞應該要⽤套頸式陷阱抓，這樣才對。
It is correct to catch mice through rangay and catch bamboo partridges through qjiulang.

S.FORM: baq maha kya, nyan cu m’uku la, pyanga ini cu ciriq.
S.TRANSL: 原來是這樣，我都搞錯了，難怪我都抓不到。
No wonder! I am mistaken and that’s why I cannot catch any of them.

S.FORM: nanu mica sbaqay misu smi qa saying pciriq qani.
S.TRANSL: 那我再教你怎麼製作這兩種陷阱。
Then I will teach you how to set up these two traps.

S.FORM: uya ga! talagay kinblaq! maha cqani lga baq cu ciriq babaw nya la.
S.TRANSL: 好啊！太棒了！這樣我以後就會抓到獵物了。
Great! I will be able to catch the prey in the future.

S.FORM: qroyux ciyan k’man qmayah la, usa magan soki kya sskwan, hata qmayah.
S.TRANSL: 田裡的草太長了，你去倉庫拿鐮刀，我們去田裡。
The grass in the fields is too tall. Go to the warehouse to take the sickle and let’s go to the fields.

S.FORM: cyan maki inu soki?
cyan maki bih na bluku, miyup su sskwan qaya lga ktalun su la.
S.TRANSL: 在圓簍(穀物乾燥簍)的旁邊，你進去倉庫就會看到了。
It is next to the round basket. You will see it when you enter the warehouse.

S.FORM: thuway magan, hboqay su nya. msngos soki qaca.
S.TRANSL: 小心拿，不要受傷。鐮刀很利。
Be careful and don’t get hurt. The sickle is very sharp.

S.FORM: ktali qplay su mrusa mu qaca!
cyan maki inu mrusa su?
mrusa mu ga cyan maki iyik na khoniq qaca.
S.TRANSL: 我的陷阱在那棵樹的下面。
My trap is under that tree.

S.FORM: cyu su qbaqun?
cyan mu ssyan patas cqani, mica qa qbaqun mu maki kya.
S.TRANSL: 我在這邊有做記號，我知道我的陷阱在哪裡。
I make a mark here, so I know where my trap is.

S.FORM: qani ga skuyu, lanay ta smi syax na gong pskuyu tqulih kya.
S.TRANSL: 這是魚筌，我們放在溪邊捕魚。
This is a fish trap which we put beside the river for fishing.

S.FORM: uka skuyu myan cqani hiya, si cami pnep qulih hiya.
S.TRANSL: 我們那邊沒有魚筌，我們都用釣竿抓魚。
We don’t have any fish traps there, so we catch fish with a fishing rod.

S.FORM: ini cu pnep hiya, sbaqi cu cikay babaw nya ki?
S.TRANSL: 我沒有用過釣竿，你下次教我好嗎?
I have never used a fishing rod before, would you mind teaching me next time?

S.FORM: uya ga! babaw nya ga psqun ta musa mnep qulih.
S.TRANSL: 好啊!我們下次一起去釣魚。
Sure! Let’s go fishing together next time.

S.FORM: sbaqay misu pskuyu qulih babaw nya.
S.TRANSL: I will teach you how to make a fish trap next time.

S.FORM: cyan miyuy boyax nnep su la, hay cya prom qulih la! nhay heci.
S.TRANSL: 你的釣竿動了，是不是有魚上鉤了!你快拉起來。
Your fishing rod is moving. Isn’t the fish on the hook? Pull it up!

S.FORM: ini na, lokah miyuy gune kacu qani. hetaw mu cqani nnep mu, usa thaca isu ragi cu magan tara.
S.TRANSL: 等等，船太晃了。我在這邊拉釣竿，你去那邊幫我拿網子來。
Wait, the ship is rolling heavily. I am here to pull the fishing rod and you should go there to grab me the net.

S.FORM: het ru holuy cqani qulih. ragay misu hmit.
S.TRANSL: 你把魚拉到我這邊。我幫妳拉起來。
Pull the fish to my side and I will help you pull it up.

S.FORM: tlagay kinblaq! piyux nagan ta, nyan so’un qulih yawa la.
S.TRANSL: 太好了!今天大豐收，魚簍都裝滿了。
Great! It is a bumper crop today with full fish baskets.

S.FORM: nahay hata muyax, halay ta smapat maniq kya.
S.TRANSL: 我們快回去和大家分享。
Let’s go back immediately and share it with everyone.

S.FORM: nyan mwah sesiy la.
ta cisal loyi la, helax mtama kya cntman su.
S.TRANSL: 不要再玩了，快坐在座位上。
Stop playing and quickly sit in your seat.

S.FORM: swali cu, mcuqi cu tehuq la!
helax miyup cka tkbaqan.
pisa hngawan na ryax mwani coni?
hngawan ryax mwani ga te magal ryax, mhngaw cyuxan, glux ta musa mcisal haw!
S.TRANSL: 今天星期五，明天放假，一起出去玩吧!
It’s Friday today, we have a day off tomorrow. Let’s go out and play together!

S.FORM: uya, hata mcisal syax gong.
S.TRANSL: Great! Let’s go to the riverside.

S.FORM: pisa hngawan na ryax cyuxan?
S.TRANSL: What day will it be tomorrow?

S.FORM: cyuxan ga te tyugan ryax na hngawan, qlyan cyuxan ga usa ta mcisal boru ki?
S.TRANSL: 明天星期三，我們明天下午去玩球吧?
Tomorrow will be Wednesday. Let’s go play ball tomorrow afternoon!

S.FORM: nanu ptyawun su saniq cyuxan?
S.TRANSL: What will you be doing tomorrow morning?

S.FORM: cyuxan ga hngawan na ryax, kingan ro yaya ga musa cami Kyokay.
S.TRANSL: 明天是星期日，我要和媽媽去教會。
Tomorrow will be Sunday, I will be going to church with my mom.

S.FORM: nyan su hmcwa la?
mutaq cu, musa cu stnxan.
S.TRANSL: I feel like vomiting. I need to go to the restroom.

S.FORM: tkgil ciyal tunux mu.
si srapa mhngaw isu.
sesiy, mxal ktu mu, usa cu stnxan.
S.TRANSL: 老師，我肚子痛，要去廁所。
Teacher, I have a stomachache. I need to go to the restroom.

S.FORM: uya, helax hayi usa.
huyay cu musa mima qba ga?
S.TRANSL: May I go wash my hands?

S.FORM: ya kinga masuq mqwas la, nna cikah ro usa.
S.TRANSL: It’s almost time for class to end. Wait a little longer.

S.FORM: sesiy, mxal ciyal tunux mu, qlyan ga msina cu hngawan.
S.TRANSL: 老師，我頭好痛，下午要請假。
It’s almost time for class to end. Wait a little longer.

S.FORM: uya, pnbaq lungan mbinah su muyax.
S.TRANSL: Okay, take care and go home.

S.FORM: Sesiy, sina cu hngaw te qutux ryax qa hngawan, musa cu pktayux Ising.
S.TRANSL: 老師，我下禮拜一要請假，我要去看醫生。
Teacher, I need to take a sick leave next Monday. I have to see a doctor.

S.FORM: uya, klhangiy nanak he su.
cyan inu Ciwas?
mxal ktu nya, cyan maki kya stnxan.
S.TRANSL: She has a stomachache. She’s in the restroom.

S.FORM: cyan inu Losing?
Sesiy, mxal qolu ro qelis qba na Losing, wan mhnaw mwani coni.
S.TRANSL: 老師，Losing喉嚨痛和手受傷，今天請假。
Teacher, Losing has a sore throat. She took a sick leave today.

S.FORM: hmcwa ini uwah Sayun?
cyan mkilux tunux nya.
pinbaqi cu isu nanak.
Watan Silan lalu ma, mpux kawas mu mwani.
S.TRANSL: My name is Watan Silan, and I’m 10 years old.

S.FORM: ima lalu su?
lalu mu ga Losing Moqu.
laqi na rok nunu qa isu?
S.TRANSL: What ethnic group are you from?

S.FORM: kingan ga laqi Tayal.
qutux cnmuyax cimu ga Genzyumin qabax?
S.TRANSL: 你的家人都是原住民嗎?
Are all your family members indigenous?

S.FORM: uya, cami qutux cnmuyax ga cquliq Tayal qabax.
S.TRANSL: 是的，我們全家都是泰雅族人。
Yes, my whole family is Atayal.

S.FORM: qutux cnmuyax cimu ga Genzyumin qabax?
S.TRANSL: 你的家人都是原住民嗎?
Are all your family members indigenous?

S.FORM: iyat, yaba mu ga Tayal, kaht qa yaya mu hiya.
S.TRANSL: 不是，我的爸爸是泰雅族，我的媽媽是漢人。
No, my father is Atayal, and my mother is Han Taiwanese.

S.FORM: isu ga laqi na ima?
kingan ga laqi na Hayung Pasang.
qaca ga yaba su? pisa kawas nya la?
S.TRANSL: 那位是你爸爸嗎? 他幾歲了?
Is that your father? How old is he?

S.FORM: tiyu pgan kawas nya la.
qaca ga yaba su? pisa kawas nya la?
S.TRANSL: 那位是你爸爸嗎? 他幾歲了?
Is that your father? How old is he?

S.FORM: iyat, hiya ga bnheci na qalang myan, spat pgan kawas nya la.
S.TRANSL: 不是，他是我們部落的耆老，他80歲了。
No, he is an elder of our tribe. He is 80 years old.

S.FORM: pisa kawas na qbsuyan su la?
mpux spat kawas qa qbsuyan mu la.
cpngan ga hnyasun nya pisa kawas isu qa qbsuyan su?
S.TRANSL: 你哥哥年紀比你大很多嗎?
Is your brother much older than you?

S.FORM: kya magan kawas cnpngan hayi qa ini ptnaq kawas myan.
pisa kbawiq qa he su?
kingan ga qutux kbhul spat pgan kongbung.
mbsyaq ta ini pktayux, ini ga wan su mhlawax loyi?
S.TRANSL: 好久不見，你是不是長高了?
I haven’t seen you in a while. Have you grown taller?

S.FORM: uya, qutux kbhul tiyul kongbung kingan la.
ini ga nyan su mqthoy la?
ini ay, mnuqu su ktayux la.
nyan su mhekang la?
ini ay, nyan cu mqthoy.
wan su mqthoy la ga?
uya, tiyul kongking kn’usux he mu.
musa su inu?
musa cu mhkani sesiy qa pintyawan nya kya.
S.TRANSL: I’m going to the office to see the teacher.

S.FORM: Yuraw musa su inu?
musa muling baliq qa hiya.
S.TRANSL: He’s going to throw away the trash.

S.FORM: cyan inu Pasang?
cyan maki halan lngya’an kya, musa mcpung mlngya kisa.
S.TRANSL: 他在游泳池，他等一下要比賽游泳。
He’s at the swimming pool. He’s going to compete in a swimming competition later.

S.FORM: cyan maki inu Yabung? hiya ga musa mcpung mktlyung kisa.
S.TRANSL: Yabung在哪裡?她等一下要比賽跑步。
Where is Yabung? She’s going to compete in a running competition later.

S.FORM: cyan maki iyik muyax kya lnhuyan, sgyun mu hiya.
S.TRANSL: She’s in the auditorium. I’ll go call her.

S.FORM: gulux ta musa ktlyungan kya.
S.TRANSL: Let’s go to the playground together.

S.FORM: lmun mu mes nniqun kryax, nna cikah halay misu hkani kisa.
S.TRANSL: 我先去買午餐，等一下去找你。
I’ll go buy lunch first, and then I’ll meet you later.

S.FORM: msqun ta lmeliq ssbil!
S.TRANSL: Let’s carry the lunch boxes together!

S.FORM: usa hkani cquliq, musa cu hkani sesiy.
S.TRANSL: 你找別人，我要去找老師。
You find someone else, I’m going to find the teacher.

S.FORM: kisa ga musa mcpung tcingan boru Yukan?
S.TRANSL: Is Yukan competing in croquet today?

S.FORM: ini, musa mcpung mstopaw.
S.TRANSL: No, he’s competing in high jump.

S.FORM: ryax na unrokay ga musa su mcpung uyi?
S.TRANSL: 運動會那天你會上場比賽嗎?
Will you compete in the sports day?

S.FORM: uya, musa cu mcpung mktlyung.
ryax na unrokay ga musa su mcpung uyi?
S.TRANSL: 運動會那天你會上場比賽嗎?
Will you compete in the sports day?

S.FORM: musa cu mcpung tcingan boru.
nanu ptyawan ta ryax na unrokay qaca?
S.TRANSL: 我們運動會那天要做甚麼?
What will we do in the sports day?

S.FORM: musa ta mcpung hmuluy gasing qthoy.
S.TRANSL: We will compete in tug of war.

S.FORM: unrokay ta ga ptbes ta nniqun?
S.TRANSL: 我們運動會要賣食物嗎?
Will we sell food at the sports day?

S.FORM: iyat, ptbes ta sbobus.
wan su magal cnpngan te qutux, klokah su ciyal!
S.TRANSL: 你獲得了第一名耶，真是厲害！
Congratulations on getting first place! You’re amazing!

S.FORM: mhuway su.
cyan maki muyax yaki ga?
cyan, cyan m’abi ’byan nya kya.
S.TRANSL: Yes, she’s sleeping in her room.

S.FORM: cyan maki muyax yaki ga?
ini kaki, wayal tanux mwani, gbyan ga mwah muyax.
S.TRANSL: 不在，她剛出去了，要晚上才回家。
No, she’s not. She just went out and will be back in the evening.

S.FORM: cyan maki muyax yutas ga?
cyan maki te saying krawan muyax, trkah isu hali hkani hiya.
S.TRANSL: 他在二樓，你上去找他吧。
He’s upstairs. You can go up and find him.

S.FORM: maki cquliq nya muyax ga?
baq isu Yuraw ga, mbisyq su ini ktaliy, lokah su ga?
S.TRANSL: 是Yuraw阿，很久沒有看到你了，你好嗎?
It’s Yuraw. I haven’t seen you in a while! How have you been?

S.FORM: lokah cu, nyan cu mwah hkani mcisal isu.
S.TRANSL: I’m doing great! I came to chat with you.

S.FORM: cyan inu yaba su?
cyan psyus rramat tnpuyan kya, sgyaw mu.
S.TRANSL: 他在廚房炒菜，我去叫他。
He’s in the kitchen cooking. Let me go call him.

S.FORM: wayal inu Ciwas la?
wayal miyap ngta kya libu ngta.
S.TRANSL: She went to the chicken coop to catch chickens.

S.FORM: yutas nyan cami la.
ini kaki muyax kya yutas mamu, cyan maki claqan kya, si mnna uwah nya muyax cimu.
S.TRANSL: 你們的爺爺不在家，他在田裡，你們在家等他回來吧。
Your grandfather is not at home. He’s in the field. Wait for him to come back.

S.FORM: mama ’nyan su la ga?
mbsyaq ini pktayux nyan su hmlawax la.
S.TRANSL: I haven’t seen you in a while. You’ve grown taller.

S.FORM: ktalan mu ’nyan su ga mqas calay lungan.
S.TRANSL: It’s so good to see you.

S.FORM: onray qani ga bniq cimu, syaniy iyik kulu tltuw.
S.TRANSL: 這是給你們的鳳梨，要放到冰箱裡。
Here’s a pineapple for you. Put it in the refrigerator.

S.FORM: bsyaq ciyal ini cimu uwah, sgyaw mu qabax ta squn maniq.
S.TRANSL: 這麼久沒來，我叫大家一起來吃飯。
It’s been a while. Let’s have a meal together.

S.FORM: ana qeri ta tyagiy la, si cu nbux oca. bkal ta mcisal iyik muyax.
S.TRANSL: 不用麻煩了，我喝茶就好，我們來客廳聊天。
No need to bother. I’ll just have tea. Let’s sit in the living room and chat.

S.FORM: ta tkkoh, si ta nbux oca. mcisal ta iyik muyax.
S.TRANSL: 謝謝你的招待，我要回去了。
Thank you for your hospitality. I have to go now.

S.FORM: knut coni ngta qani, aray muyax thwayiy maniq.
S.TRANSL: 這隻雞剛殺好，你帶回去慢慢吃。
This chicken was just freshly killed. Take it home and enjoy it slowly.

S.FORM: pnkyalan mu ki isu stnaq ta qlyan suxan ki?
S.TRANSL: 我和您約明天下午好嗎?
Can I make an appointment with you tomorrow afternoon?

S.FORM: uya, pstnaq ta pnkyalan inu?
pstnaq ta pnkyalan sa pinqwasan biru ki? musa cu magal ega ha?
S.TRANSL: 我們約學校好嗎?我們要錄影。
How about meeting at school? We need to shoot a video.

S.FORM: nanu mica hata mlahuy lnhuyan na qalang, plukus cu lukus Tayal musa.
S.TRANSL: 那去聚會所好了，我會穿族服去。
Then let’s go to the community center. I’ll wear folk costume.

S.FORM: betunux calay phpah na Sakura qa qalang myan, trang phpah nasa ga halay cu hkani ki.
S.TRANSL: 我們部落的櫻花盛開很漂亮。等花開的時候你來找我吧!
The cherry blossoms in our tribe are beautiful when they bloom. Come find me when the flowers bloom!

S.FORM: si ga mnna ta eta tmangux abax, mcuqi ciyal la haw!
S.TRANSL: 那要等到春天，太晚了吧!
That would have to wait until spring. It’s too late, isn’t it?

S.FORM: kasuq mlahang gaga Kluh laga uwah qa isu!
S.TRANSL: 那你收穫祭的時候來吧!
Then come during our Harvest Festival!

S.FORM: uya haw! sinnoya mu calay!
S.TRANSL: Alright! I’m looking forward to it!

S.FORM: pqutay misu hmcwa su mbinah mwah sqyanux qalang loyi?
S.TRANSL: 請問你為甚麼要搬回部落生活?
May I ask why you decided to move back to the tribe?

S.FORM: mbinah cu musa pcbaq biru.
S.TRANSL: I want to return to teach at the local school.

S.FORM: hmswa pcbaq su biru ga ini su kaki kya qalang benux?
S.TRANSL: Why not teach in the city?

S.FORM: baha hmcwa s’nun mu qalang mu, smoya cu hoyay cu smyuk gmalu qalang mu.
S.TRANSL: 因為我懷念我的故鄉，也希望能回饋部落。
Because I miss my hometown and I also want to give back to the tribe.

S.FORM: baq su calay tminun, ima pincbaq isu?
S.TRANSL: 你很會織布，是誰教你的?
You’re very skilled at weaving, who taught you?

S.FORM: pincbaq yaki mu, hiya ga cquliq piyang baq tminun na qalang myan.
S.TRANSL: 是我的奶奶，她是我們部落最會織布的人。
It was my grandmother, she is the most skilled weaver in our tribe.

S.FORM: hmcwa su soya calay tkbaq tminun pala?
S.TRANSL: How did you develop an interest in learning weaving?

S.FORM: tminun pala ga gaga na Tayal, soya cu mc’ubuy gaga na Tayal.
S.TRANSL: 織布是我們的文化，我想要讓文化延續。
Weaving is a part of our culture, and I want to ensure its continuity.

S.FORM: blaq buxun calay qwaw trakis qani.
knalay mu nanak!
baq su calay, musa mbsyaq klayun qani?
S.TRANSL: 你真厲害，這要釀很久嗎?
You’re really talented. Does it take a long time to make?

S.FORM: ini ay, kya hayi qutux hngawan ryax, musa lman tahuq bwax ru pagay rhekil, twangan mimax cikah benhung, ro ana skron iyik yuyut la.
S.TRANSL: 不用，大約一周就好了。把糯米和白米先蒸熟，再加入麴粉一起拌勻，就可以裝到甕裡了。
No, it only takes about a week. After steaming the sticky rice and white rice, we mix it with yeast powder, and then it can be stored in a jar.

S.FORM: nanu nyan su ptbesan?
maki qurip ro qenu cqani, qabax qani ga pinuya mu wah!
S.TRANSL: 我這裡有辣椒和蕗蕎，都是我自己種的喔!
I have chili and lokiy, both grown by myself!

S.FORM: mesay mu sayin qaca musa pisa pila?
squnun ga musa saying kbhul miman pila hriqun.
siyan mu lukus qani, pisa pila hriqun?
S.TRANSL: 我喜歡這件衣服，多少錢?
I like this piece of clothing. How much is it?

S.FORM: lukus qani ga magal kbhul pila hriqun.
stun ciyal la, ini baqi tbiyaq pila hayi ga?
S.TRANSL: It’s too expensive. Can’t you lower the price a bit?

S.FORM: ini kbaqi, tbyaqan pila ga musa skyutan hayi.
S.TRANSL: No, if I lower it further, I’ll lose money.

S.FORM: uya, nanu mica soya cu magal lukus mqatung.
S.TRANSL: 好吧!那我要一件黑色的衣服。
Alright then, I’ll take a black piece of clothing.

S.FORM: galun mu lalaw qaca ro limuk qaca.
S.TRANSL: 我要這把刀和這個鍋子。
I want this knife and this pot.

S.FORM: squnan ga saying seng pila, qani ga knalay qba mu nanak, tngsa lungan mu musa mbsyaq cukaw su.
S.TRANSL: 總共2000元，這是我自己手工打造的，保證可以用很久。
It’s a total of 2000 dollars. I handmade these, and they are guaranteed to last a long time.

S.FORM: lanay misu syoka lpyung mwah mes, ana su thwayun cikah ptbes?
S.TRANSL: 我介紹朋友來買，可以再便宜一些嗎?
I’ll introduce my friend to buy. Can you give a further discount?

S.FORM: uya raxay misu kbhul paseng ga spat paseng mesan misu.
S.TRANSL: Alright! I’ll give you a 20% discount.

S.FORM: uwah ktayux cikah, ana lukus, qbubu ga nyan ptbes qabax.
S.TRANSL: 來看看喔!衣服帽子都有賣。
Come and take a look! We sell clothes and hats.

S.FORM: pqutay misu pisa pila lukus qani?
qutux lukus ga tyugan kbhul miman pila, squnan tyugan ga qutux seng pila.
S.TRANSL: One piece of clothing is 350 dollars, three pieces for 1000 dollars.

S.FORM: ana qutux nanak mesan mu, biqi cu xqayus na lukus.
S.TRANSL: 我買一件就好，請給我新的。
I’ll just buy one piece, please give me a new one.

S.FORM: lokah su, soya cu mes sumul ro syam pglux hpuyan maqaw.
S.TRANSL: 你好，我想要買糯米飯和山胡椒滷肉。
Hello, I would like to buy sticky rice and braised pork with maqaw pepper.

S.FORM: masuq ptbes mami la, maki menpin tana hayi na, mesan su ga?
S.TRANSL: 飯賣完了。我還有刺蔥油餅，你要買嗎?
The rice is sold out. I have tana pancakes, would you like to buy them?

S.FORM: uya, biqi cu qutux cbwan, babaw nya mwah cu mes loyi.
S.TRANSL: 好吧!請給我一份，我下次再來買飯。
Alright, please give me one. I’ll come back next time to buy rice.

S.FORM: uya, raxay misu skran iyik kapa, maha qaca ga miman pila hriqun
S.TRANSL: W：好，我幫你用袋子裝起來，這樣50元。
Okay, I’ll pack it in a bag for you. That’ll be 50 dollars.
